amendment.description: To provide for continuation of part-time or intermittent home health care benefits during transition to the sub-acute care program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3209 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3209 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5786; text: CR S5786) To provide for continuation of part-time or intermittent home health care benefits during transition to the sub-acute care program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3209 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3209 proposed by Senator Warner.
